name: Edexia
headline: AI Teaching Assistant for Grading Papers
description:
Edexia is an AI teaching assistant that grades papers for teachers. It learns the style of each individual teacher, so it can grade just like they do, saving up to 100% of grading time.  
Edexia can grade assignments from any curriculum, year level, subject, or format. Learning like a teacher, it visually breaks down its understanding of the rubric, and updates this as a teacher corrects its grading on the fly. 
Our vision is to transform education by facilitating the safe and effective integration of AI across all institutions and applications. Not using AI to replace teachers but rather to empower them—providing them with all the time and resources they need to develop their students.
tags: industry:ai-enhanced-learning; industry:education; industry:saas; industry:ai; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Daniel Gibbon, Founder
founders.description: CEO at Edexia. On a mission to transform education. Scaled an EdTech startup to $200K ARR at 18 before founding Edexia. TEDx Speaker on AI in education. Ranked top 30 in my state out of high school. Switched from medical school to software engineering at UQ, achieving a perfect GPA.

founders.name: Nathan Wang, Founder
founders.description: on a mission to transform education!

A Grading Assistant Trained and Controlled by You

everything.

handwriting
diagrams
graphs
everything.

St Margaret's
Save 80% of grading time
while doing more for your students
with safe, teacher-like AI.
[Trained by You](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)
### Trained by you
#### [Listens to your correctionsCorrect Edexia's decisions to align with your judgement.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b71d6ff4cd6baef9e129fc/67a515739100b9c1c8492767_kevin-pastor-JWukvp82Ljs-unsplash.webp)](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-0>)#### [Asks clarifying questionsJust like a colleague, Edexia will seek clarity if needed. ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b71d6ff4cd6baef9e129fc/67a515739100b9c1c849275e_christian-bowen-yuOAcypoF1I-unsplash.webp)](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-1>)#### [Updates its gradingAccording to your correction, Edexia updates its grade, justification and feedback.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b71d6ff4cd6baef9e129fc/67a515739100b9c1c8492770_nathan-dumlao-_-prYEEf0v4-unsplash.webp)](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-2>)#### [Refines its understandingEdexia learns from your corrections by updating its understanding of the rubric.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b71d6ff4cd6baef9e129fc/67a515739100b9c1c8492770_nathan-dumlao-_-prYEEf0v4-unsplash.webp)](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-3>)
### Keeps you in control
#### [Requires your approvalEdexia acts as an initial drafter to enhance, not replace, your professional judgement.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b71d6ff4cd6baef9e129fc/67a515739100b9c1c8492767_kevin-pastor-JWukvp82Ljs-unsplash.webp)](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-0>)#### [Transparent decision makingEdexia displays its justification and chain of thought for every grading decision.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b71d6ff4cd6baef9e129fc/67a515739100b9c1c849275e_christian-bowen-yuOAcypoF1I-unsplash.webp)](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-1>)#### [Transparent learningEdexia learns by visually updating its understanding of the rubric, which you can adjust at any time.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b71d6ff4cd6baef9e129fc/67a515739100b9c1c8492770_nathan-dumlao-_-prYEEf0v4-unsplash.webp)](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-2>)#### [Insightful analyticsWhile edexia automates weekly homework, it keeps you in the loop with in-depth analytics.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b71d6ff4cd6baef9e129fc/67a515739100b9c1c8492770_nathan-dumlao-_-prYEEf0v4-unsplash.webp)](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-3>)
### Works for everything
#### [Summative assessmentEdexia handles the complexity of all summative assessment, but doesn’t have final decision-making power.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b71d6ff4cd6baef9e129fc/67a515739100b9c1c8492767_kevin-pastor-JWukvp82Ljs-unsplash.webp)](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-3-data-w-pane-0>)#### [Formative assessmentEdexia can fully automate weekly homework, from creation to grading to providing feedback and reporting back to you.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b71d6ff4cd6baef9e129fc/67a515739100b9c1c849275e_christian-bowen-yuOAcypoF1I-unsplash.webp)](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-3-data-w-pane-1>)#### [All subjectsFrom intricate engineering reports to nuanced humanities essays.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b71d6ff4cd6baef9e129fc/67a515739100b9c1c8492770_nathan-dumlao-_-prYEEf0v4-unsplash.webp)](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-3-data-w-pane-2>)#### [All modalitiesFrom handwriting and drawings to graphs and charts.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b71d6ff4cd6baef9e129fc/67a515739100b9c1c8492770_nathan-dumlao-_-prYEEf0v4-unsplash.webp)](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-3-data-w-pane-3>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b71d6ff4cd6baef9e129fc/679d27a19b758a112f921ac5_notebook\xa0Imagem.png)
## For Summative
Edexia streamlines the grading of complex summative pieces, from nuanced essays to intricate engineering reports, but it’s not designed to have final decision-making power.By pre-grading each assignment, Edexia can save you countless hours, allowing you to bring your expertise to moderation and have the final say.
## For Formative
Edexia can fully automate formative assessment, from creating the tasks to grading student responses and providing personalized feedback.Using Edexia for weekly homework ensures students receive consistent, tailored insights into their progress, which can rapidly accelerate their learning.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b71d6ff4cd6baef9e129fc/679d27a163ea6b4961575b78_Frame%20115.png)
### Seamless Implementation
Edexia integrates directly into your existing workflows and LMS and requires no formal training to get set up. The interface is designed to be as intuitive as possible, but if you ever need support, we're always available to help.

### Data Privacy
All training data is siloed to individual or institutional accounts and remains the intellectual property of the account holders. We don't use this data to train our AI. All data is de-identified and securely stored on locally based servers. For more information, visit our [Legal pages](https://www.edexia.ai/<https:/www.edexia.ai/legal>).
For individuals and institutions
Sign up to get access as an individual educator, or for your institution.
[Get Access ](https://www.edexia.ai/</get-access>)
## Frequently Asked Questions
What about data privacy and security?
We understand the sensitive nature of this information and have implemented robust measures to protect it. Our approach is unique: Edexia learns like a teacher, not an AI, which means we never train on your data. Your information remains exclusively yours and stays within your school, allowing you to use Edexia just as you would any other assessment submission platform. We also ensure that no unsecured third-party access is allowed. All your uploaded assessments are stored securely on Australian servers, encrypted in transit, and access is audited. For more details, please refer to our [Legal pages](https://www.edexia.ai/<https:/www.edexia.ai/legal>).
How much time does it take for teacher to learn?
We have designed Edexia to be as intuitive as possible. Marking with Edexia is like moderating a colleague; you interact with it just as you would with another teacher. This means there is effectively nothing new to learn. Combined with our continuous efforts to optimise the user interface, Edexia is so intuitive that most teachers don't even need a demo to understand how to use it. Nevertheless, we provide constant and immediate support to every school we work with, just in case.
How many assignments before Edexia starts saving me time?
Hopefully, zero. Our goal is to make Edexia as accurate as possible right from the start by using any information provided during the upload process. Even if Edexia is entirely inaccurate initially, you only need to press one button and talk to it. It will then convert your input into perfectly written feedback for the student. So, even when it's not fully accurate, it acts as an AI scribe, helping you write feedback more efficiently. Over time, Edexia learns and progressively becomes more accurate, saving you even more time.
Can I trust the accuracy of Edexia's grading?
Yes, because the teacher moderates its output and remains ultimately responsible for the accuracy of the mark. When you first use Edexia, its accuracy may need some improvement. However, as you continue to use the platform, you'll notice it improving and may even begin to trust its judgment—potentially more than your own at some point. Since you are the one training Edexia, it simply learns how you want to mark and follows that consistently.
Can I trust the accuracy of Edexia's grading?
We can track exactly how the platform is being used, how much time a teacher is spending on an assignment, and how many moderations are being made. School leaders can then review this information to ensure it is being used properly.

Trained by You⟨22⟩
### Trained by you
#### Listens to your correctionsCorrect Edexia's decisions to align with your judgement.![⟨23⟩](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-0>)#### Asks clarifying questionsJust like a colleague, Edexia will seek clarity if needed. ![⟨24⟩](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-1>)#### Updates its gradingAccording to your correction, Edexia updates its grade, justification and feedback.![⟨25⟩](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-2>)#### Refines its understandingEdexia learns from your corrections by updating its understanding of the rubric.![⟨25⟩](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-3>)
### Keeps you in control
#### Requires your approvalEdexia acts as an initial drafter to enhance, not replace, your professional judgement.![⟨23⟩](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-0>)#### Transparent decision makingEdexia displays its justification and chain of thought for every grading decision.![⟨24⟩](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-1>)#### Transparent learningEdexia learns by visually updating its understanding of the rubric, which you can adjust at any time.![⟨25⟩](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-2>)#### Insightful analyticsWhile edexia automates weekly homework, it keeps you in the loop with in-depth analytics.![⟨25⟩](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-3>)
### Works for everything
#### Summative assessmentEdexia handles the complexity of all summative assessment, but doesn’t have final decision-making power.![⟨23⟩](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-3-data-w-pane-0>)#### Formative assessmentEdexia can fully automate weekly homework, from creation to grading to providing feedback and reporting back to you.![⟨24⟩](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-3-data-w-pane-1>)#### All subjectsFrom intricate engineering reports to nuanced humanities essays.![⟨25⟩](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-3-data-w-pane-2>)#### All modalitiesFrom handwriting and drawings to graphs and charts.![⟨25⟩](https://www.edexia.ai/<#w-tabs-3-data-w-pane-3>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b71d6ff4cd6baef9e129fc/679d27a19b758a112f921ac5_notebook\xa0Imagem.png)
## For Summative
Edexia streamlines the grading of complex summative pieces, from nuanced essays to intricate engineering reports, but it’s not designed to have final decision-making power.By pre-grading each assignment, Edexia can save you countless hours, allowing you to bring your expertise to moderation and have the final say.
## For Formative
Edexia can fully automate formative assessment, from creating the tasks to grading student responses and providing personalized feedback.Using Edexia for weekly homework ensures students receive consistent, tailored insights into their progress, which can rapidly accelerate their learning.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b71d6ff4cd6baef9e129fc/679d27a163ea6b4961575b78_Frame%20115.png)
### Seamless Implementation
Edexia integrates directly into your existing workflows and LMS and requires no formal training to get set up. The interface is designed to be as intuitive as possible, but if you ever need support, we're always available to help.

### Data Privacy
All training data is siloed to individual or institutional accounts and remains the intellectual property of the account holders. We don't use this data to train our AI. All data is de-identified and securely stored on locally based servers. For more information, visit our Legal pages⟨26⟩.
For individuals and institutions
Sign up to get access as an individual educator, or for your institution.
Get Access ⟨5⟩
## Frequently Asked Questions
What about data privacy and security?
We understand the sensitive nature of this information and have implemented robust measures to protect it. Our approach is unique: Edexia learns like a teacher, not an AI, which means we never train on your data. Your information remains exclusively yours and stays within your school, allowing you to use Edexia just as you would any other assessment submission platform. We also ensure that no unsecured third-party access is allowed. All your uploaded assessments are stored securely on Australian servers, encrypted in transit, and access is audited. For more details, please refer to our Legal pages⟨26⟩.
How much time does it take for teacher to learn?
We have designed Edexia to be as intuitive as possible. Marking with Edexia is like moderating a colleague; you interact with it just as you would with another teacher. This means there is effectively nothing new to learn. Combined with our continuous efforts to optimise the user interface, Edexia is so intuitive that most teachers don't even need a demo to understand how to use it. Nevertheless, we provide constant and immediate support to every school we work with, just in case.
How many assignments before Edexia starts saving me time?
Hopefully, zero. Our goal is to make Edexia as accurate as possible right from the start by using any information provided during the upload process. Even if Edexia is entirely inaccurate initially, you only need to press one button and talk to it. It will then convert your input into perfectly written feedback for the student. So, even when it's not fully accurate, it acts as an AI scribe, helping you write feedback more efficiently. Over time, Edexia learns and progressively becomes more accurate, saving you even more time.
Can I trust the accuracy of Edexia's grading?
Yes, because the teacher moderates its output and remains ultimately responsible for the accuracy of the mark. When you first use Edexia, its accuracy may need some improvement. However, as you continue to use the platform, you'll notice it improving and may even begin to trust its judgment—potentially more than your own at some point. Since you are the one training Edexia, it simply learns how you want to mark and follows that consistently.
Can I trust the accuracy of Edexia's grading?
We can track exactly how the platform is being used, how much time a teacher is spending on an assignment, and how many moderations are being made. School leaders can then review this information to ensure it is being used properly.

generated_description:
### Edexia: Revolutionizing Grading with AI

**Overview**  
Edexia is an ambitious startup that aims to transform the education landscape by introducing an AI teaching assistant designed specifically for grading papers. Founded in 2023 in San Francisco and part of Y Combinator’s Batch W25, Edexia is a small but focused team of four who believe in empowering teachers, not replacing them.

**Mission**  
The core mission of Edexia is simple yet profound: to save teachers up to 100% of their grading time by learning their individual grading styles. The AI adapts to various curricula and subjects, making it versatile enough to grade everything from math and science to poetry and diagrams. The goal? Freeing up teachers from the mundane to focus more on student engagement and development.

**How It Works**  
Edexia’s AI doesn’t just churn out scores; it learns from each teacher’s unique rubric. As teachers provide corrections in real time, the system updates its understanding, ensuring that future grading aligns even more closely with the teacher's criteria. This dynamic learning process means that Edexia continuously improves, offering insights and analytics without ever compromising the teacher's control over final grades.

**Vision**  
The vision for Edexia extends beyond grading; it's about the safe and effective integration of AI in educational institutions. Edexia's leaders firmly believe that AI should support teachers, providing them with the tools and time to help their students thrive. This is a partnership model, where technology enhances rather than replaces human educators.

**Current Offerings**  
The platform is designed to handle both formative and summative assessments seamlessly. Whether grading complex essays or checking homework, Edexia ensures thoroughness while saving valuable hours for teachers. There’s even a free NAPLAN grader available to help schools get started.

**Security and Privacy**  
Data privacy is paramount at Edexia. They ensure that all training data is kept in silos to protect the privacy of individual educators and institutions. The platform is built with robust security measures, ensuring that user data remains confidential and secure.

**Conclusion**  
Edexia is paving the way for a future where AI and education go hand in hand—a future where teachers can enhance their teaching methods, engage more meaningfully with students, and manage their time more effectively. With backing from Y Combinator and a clear mission, Edexia is well-positioned to make a significant impact on the educational landscape.

For more information, visit their website: [Edexia](https://www.edexia.ai)
